msg: HADOOP-1164.  Fix TestReplicationPolicy to specify port zero, so that a free port is automatically selected.  Contributed by Owen.

author: djd
msg: Add a junit top level target (junit-all-codeline-jars) that runs the junit-all test from a codeline setting the classpath to include the derby jar files.

msg: HADOOP-1165.  In records, replace identical generated toString methods with a method on the base class.  Contributed by Milind.
